meanings.definition: Aminonaphthalene, C10H9N, used in the manufacture of dyes and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The naphthylamine is a key ingredient in making colorful dyes.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use naphthylamine to create new medicines.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled naphthylamine all over the lab, turning everything rainbow-colored!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like naphthylamine, mixing different ideas to form a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of naphthylamine lingered in the air, reminding him of his work in the pharmaceutical industry.
